artist: Artist: Mission Mini-Comix, San Francisco; Publisher: Mission Mini-Comix, San Francisco
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Cut and folded leaf, xerographic text and illustration of a figure with books, a straw, and a vinyl record coming out of its head printed on wove paper; 8 pp.
title: Mission Mini-Comix: Copy Wrong. . . the sad state of intellectual property
